title: Ticket #1943: single slot with multiple cpus is names slot1@blah
description: In glideinWMS, HTPC glideins will create a single slot with multiple cpus. The slot in this case is always named with slot1@ prepended to it, even though there is only one slot. This is because the startd decides whether or not to prepend the slot id based on whether there are multiple cpus rather than depending on whether there are multiple slots.
check_ins:
2011-Mar-02 15:10   Check-in [26083]: Documented fix for slot1 prefix when there are multiple cpus but only one slot. #1943 (By Dan Bradley )
2011-Mar-02 15:00   Check-in [20882]: Do not prepend slot1@ to slot name if there is only one slot and multiple cpus. #1943 (By Dan Bradley )
creator: danb
